remarks: If a vertex is adjacent to two different vertices in a simple graph, there is not only one edge starting at this vertex, analogous to ~ usgra2edg1 .  Lemma for theorems about friendship graphs. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 10-Dec-2017.)  (Revised by AV, 9-Jan-2020.)

$d C x $.
$d E x $.
$d G x $.
$d N x $.
